programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: Keith finds a historic house that was half renovated, and is now available at a price they could flip into one of their biggest profits ever—over 200 grand. But this old house reveals tons of problems, from an outdated electrical system, to crooked floors, to a second story with low, sloping ceilings that only a kid could love.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: This Zombie house is a literal stinker from years of cigarette smoke that has stained the walls and left a putrid smell throughout the property. But as the flippers make over this monster, things start smelling sweeter when they uncover clues to a hidden treasure. As costs of this tricky reno pile up, they hold out hope of striking it rich by unearthing a huge payday.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping
programme.desc: A large corner lot is home to a DIY nightmare--an ugly house that the previous owners left full of half-baked, shoddy renovations. From a master bath that opens into the hallway, to a bedroom as red as the gates of Hell, this property needs a complete redo. The Zombie team takes on the challenge, but with interest rates set to go up, it's a race to finish before housing prices take a tumble.

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping

programme.title: Zombie House Flipping

programme.title: Wildlife Nation with Jeff Corwin
programme.desc: Jeff embarks on a mission to help bring bison back to the North American continent. He travels to the Canadian border to help Native American tribes re-establish new bison herds across tribal lands. Jeff learns how ancient bison herds once shaped the Great Plains and how modern conservationists are fighting to bring those herds back. Later, Jeff travels to the Kodiak Island Archipelago where the native Allutiq people are managing a new population of American bison.

programme.desc: Animated fantasy about a saddened Santa who decides not to make his annual ride. The score includes such holiday favorites as "Blue Christmas," along with six tunes composed by Maury Laws and Jules Bass.

programme.desc: Salvaging large industrial doors from a bottling plant in VA.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: The team salvage a calliope from a riverboat in Parkersburg, W.Va., and split into teams to pick through the owner's large warehouse. At the shop, Courtney and Mike build a mirror from pieces of wall trim.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: The Dawgs tackle a large high school and Trenton, N.J. and salvage fireclay sinks and oak cabinets while Mike and Tay build an n-shaped desk back in the shop.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Salvaging copper elements from a Virginia church.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.sub-title: A Home Away From Home for the Holidays
programme.desc: Joanna tries to sell Chip on the idea of turning an old Victorian beauty into a bed-and-breakfast. Her vision also includes having their families check in as their first guests during the Christmas holiday.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: A couple moves from Oregon to Waco, Texas, and enlist the help of Chip and Jo to transform their outdated home.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.sub-title: Historic Tudor-Style Home for a New Family
programme.desc: Chip and Joanna take on a historical project for Courtney and Joey Scrivano, who are ready to upgrade from their modest loft to a house where they can raise their new baby. Built in 1927, their Tudor-style home is outdated, has little functionality, and lacks a true master suite. Chip and Jo get to work preserving the home's historic charm while making sure it meets the needs of this new modern family.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: Chip and Joanna help a single foster mom find a charming fixer-upper with a large backyard to raise kids.

programme.title: Fixer Upper
programme.desc: San Diego transplants are on the hunt for their family's dream home in Waco, Texas, and they're looking for a four-bedroom with a large yard and open space for hosting. Their all-in budget of $375,000 leaves them lots of room for substantial renovations, but when faced with a tough decision, they turn to their kids for the deciding vote.

programme.title: Silos Baking Competition: Holiday Edition
programme.desc: Joanna Gaines hosts Magnolia's very first holiday cookie bake-off at the Silos Baking Competition, where five talented home bakers compete for a chance to have their treat featured at the bakery during the holiday season at the Silos, and win $25, 000.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: A walk through the castle shows decades of damage and neglect that will be a restoration challenge for Chip and Jo. But the landmark's rich history inspires their determination to preserve the original architecture.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: Along with her styling team, Jo develops her vision for the castle, and commissions custom artisan pieces. Chip discovers new challenges as he learns what can be salvaged and restored to original glory, and what is too far gone.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: Jo develops new paint colors inspired by the castle's one hundred year history, and she and Chip make big decisions about interior flooring and tile, as well as the exterior stone walls, that dramatically advance renovations.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: Unexpected water damage is an expensive setback for Jo and Chip, but the installation of restored wood pieces and reclaimed tile from Europe begins to restore the original grandeur of the castle.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: In the home stretch of construction, Chip and Jo focus on perfecting the details of the castle. A design issue in the kitchen spurs Chip to insist on a last-minute change order fixing countertops and windows, and Jo gets a surprise at the Silos.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: The Castle
programme.desc: Chip and Jo are finally finished with their biggest renovation to date -- a fully restored three-story castle originally built in the early 1900s. They reveal the final design and share what it took to blend a vintage sensibility with modern comfort.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: A Magnolia employee from New York wants to make Waco, Texas, a permanent home.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: A couple asks Chip and Jo to convert their horse barn into an apartment for their son.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: A California transplant trades in the beach for a 1930s house in Waco, Texas. Chip and Jo transform the home into a beautiful cottage that highlights its history.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip and Jo help a newlywed couple overhaul a long-abandoned home.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.sub-title: Modern Take On Old World Charm
programme.desc: First-time homeowner Nicole needs Chip and Jo's help to rescue her house from the 1950s. Jo creates an elegant-yet-warm design that reflects Nicole's years living abroad, but a weather issue forces Jo to make a change from her original vision.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip and Jo bring what they love most about "home" into their redesign of a local shelter for girls.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip and Jo help a Waco, TX couple take on a difficult renovation to transform a 1970s Mediterranean money pit into a Tuscan oasis for their family of three and create a gathering place for extended family.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip purchases a minty green house on a whim with plans to flip it, but the daunting look of the interior and unexpected damage inside the home turns out to be more work than he and Jo expected.

programme.title: Fixer Upper: Welcome Home
programme.desc: Chip and Joanna expand the footprint of the Silos grounds in Waco, Texas, with the addition of new shops, a Wiffle ball field with a unique history, and the relocation and full renovation of a dilapidated church.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: Re-salvaging a house for its original log structure.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: The guys visit Wheeling W.Va., to salvage elements from an apartment building. Key items include arched doors, a double drainboard sink and wooden medallions. Back at the shop, Mike builds a wine-tasting table.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs
programme.desc: The guys tackle a ranch house in Alderson, West Virginia and salvage stained glass and corbels. Back in the shop: Mike builds a beam table from reused timber.

programme.title: Salvage Dawgs

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The team tackle two A-Frames in Maine's Sugarloaf Valley.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The team renovate a camp that's located on two ponds, but winter looms and forces them to speed up the project.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Chase and the team restore the Clary Lake property of two sisters.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Cabin Masters help a man build bedrooms and bathrooms for a man and his family.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: Now it's time to refresh the Cooper's grandfather's cottage built in the 1970s. Chase and the team update the interior kitchen and bedrooms, build safer access to the loft and remove an inflammable apple shed.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.sub-title: It Takes a Village of People
programme.desc: Ashley and Chase rally the Cabin Masters to help their summer camp by constructing an arts and crafts building.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Main Cabin Masters reveal the ten most unique builds they have done so far.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: The Rooney family loves spending their summer with relatives and friends on Great Pond. But their camp has two major issues: It's too small, and it's so dark when they're inside, they can barely tell they're on a lake.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: An off-the-grid camp is rebuilt for a family of city slickers, but limited resources complicate the project.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A look at a couple's Belle Island camp with a history spanning almost a century.

programme.title: Maine Cabin Masters
programme.desc: A couple asks for some help to expand their East Pond camp to give them more space for their family but still preserve it for the future.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part II
programme.desc: A teen time-travels from 1985 to 2015 in order to save his parents and his children from the disasters precipitated by his own mistake when he traveled to 1955 and bought a book in order to enrich himself in the future.

programme.title: Back to the Future Part III
programme.desc: A teen must leap the space-time continuum to 1885 in the DeLorean time machine in order to rescue its inventor, whose 70-year-old letter reveals that he has retired to the Old West to live out his days there. Upon arriving, the boy finds the scientist in love and in danger.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Boyd's father, played by Nick Jonas, returns unexpectedly, which troubles Mike and Kyle; and Mandy is hired by Ed to be an elf at the shop, and she organizes the other elves to demand perks.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike wants to give Vanessa a stress-free holiday without their daughters and grandson, so he tries to send the kids away for Christmas. Meanwhile, Ed goes turkey hunting and shoots a bald eagle by mistake.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Vanessa encourages Mandy to join a sorority, which could lead to the end of her romance with Kyle. Elsewhere, Ed pretends to be a loading-dock employee in order to investigate productivity problems.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Kristin compares laid-back Ryan to her industrious boss, and Ryan comes up short as he remains on strike from his job. Elsewhere, Mike and Eve try to catch one another off guard as Eve works on her sniper training.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Vanessa runs a haunted-house fund-raiser for Boyd's school, but her spooky concepts frighten Boyd. A concerned Mike then tries to get his grandson to overcome his fears.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike doesn't support his neighbor's bid for election to the school board, which makes him a likely suspect in the mystery of her missing campaign signs. Elsewhere, Eve's sisters give her contradictory advice on romance; and Kyle gets jealous of Ryan.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Eve is eager to resume her snow-shoveling business when a snowstorm hits town. However, she soon discovers that her financially-strapped neighbor has beaten her to the punch, so Mike counsels her on capitalism.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Vanessa persuades Mandy to dump Kyle, but then she regrets meddling and tries to repair things, doing even more harm in the process.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Bud's harsh method of disciplining Boyd doesn't sit well with Kristin, Ryan and—to Bud's surprise—Mike. Elsewhere, Mandy buys a new hat for Kyle, and he's confused by the meaning behind this gift.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Boyd acts restless at school, prompting his teacher to recommend ADHD medication for him. Elsewhere, Mandy turns a new leaf regarding schoolwork and devotes a significant amount of time to studying.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Boyd's school may undergo a name change following Boyd's eye-opening report on its namesake. Elsewhere, Mandy turns to Blanca for assistance with a class project.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Roses arrive anonymously at the Baxter home on Valentine's Day, and there are several suspects. However, Mike is not among them, because he gifts Vanessa with a Taser.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: A Christmas surprise awaits the family's housekeeper, and Mandy's the one who's secretly behind it. Elsewhere, Ryan wants to inform Boyd that his new elf doll isn't really magical, but Mike wants Ryan to see the benefits of believing in Christmas magic.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Mike and Vanessa offer a generous Christmas gift to Kristin and Ryan, but there are strings attached to it. Elsewhere, a motivated Kyle seeks a poker tutorial from Ed.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: Christmas stress mounts for Vanessa, so Mike tries to help her by delegating her many holiday tasks to members of the family.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.desc: The Baxters meet Rob, Eve's new boyfriend, at Christmas time, and Mike learns a secret about him. Meanwhile, Mandy persuades Kristin to drop hints to Kyle about what he should get his wife for Christmas.

programme.title: Last Man Standing
programme.sub-title: The Gift of the Mike Guy
programme.desc: Mike finds getting Ed a special Christmas present is easier said than done. Meanwhile, Eve returns to visit and Vanessa helps the family realize the importance of their long-standing holiday family traditions.

programme.title: Journey to the Center of the Earth
programme.desc: Brendan Fraser stars as a geologist who ventures deep below the Earth's crust to find his missing brother in this fast-paced, kid-friendly adventure loosely based on the oft-filmed Jules Verne classic. programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Alabama (1-0) at Texas (1-0). From DKR-Texas Memorial Stadium. Second-year Texas coach Steve Sarkisian faces the squad he assistant coached in his previous stint (2019-20), with RB Bijan Robinson powering the 'Horns vs. LB Will Anderson Jr. and 'Bama. The Tide won the last meeting for the 2009 BCS Championship.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Michigan (11-0) at Ohio State (11-0). From Ohio Stadium. It's the first time since 2006 that these bitter rivals meet while both undefeated, with a Big Ten title shot on the line. The Wolverines won 42-27 last year to snap an eight-game series slide.

programme.title: College Football
programme.desc: Southern California (9-1) at UCLA (8-2). From the Rose Bowl. QB Caleb Williams and top target Jordan Addison lead USC's bid to avenge last year's 62-33 loss to the Bruins, SC's worst setback in this rivalry since 1954. RB Zach Charbonnet powers UCLA.

programme.title: FIFA WORLD CUP QATAR 2022: All The Goals
programme.desc: A complete recap of the 172 goals scored in the FIFA World Cup in Qatar.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Argentina vs. France in the final. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. Golden Boot contenders Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappe (five goals each in Qatar) star in the 11th clash of South America and Europe in a final. Didier Deschamps and "Les Bleus" can become the first back-to-back champs since Brazil 60 years ago, while the Argentines look to end a 36-year title drought since the days of Diego Maradona. Julian Alvarez and Olivier Giroud (four goals each) head the supporting casts.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Germany vs. Japan in a Group E opener. From Khalifa International Stadium in Al Rayyan, Qatar. Goalkeeper Manuel Neuer opens his fourth World Cup for Germany, now coached by Hansi Flick. MF Daichi Kamada heads a heavy German club presence for Japan, with seven players toiling in the top two Bundesliga divisions.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Morocco vs. Portugal in a quarterfinal match. From Al Thumama Stadium in Doha, Qatar. Tournament Cinderella Morocco eyes Africa's first-ever semifinal berth after a defense keyed by PSG's Achraf Hakimi allowed just an own goal in four games. Portugal showed its strength beyond Cristiano Ronaldo in a 6-1 rout of the Swiss to open the knockout round.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: England vs. France in a quarterfinal match. From Al Bayt Stadium in Al Khor, Qatar. Gareth Southgate's England squad have scored a tournament-high 12 goals, while French dynamo Kylian Mbappe's five goals led the Golden Boot race entering this round. On all-time goals lists, Harry Kane is one shy of catching England leader Wayne Rooney, while Olivier Giroud became France's all-time leader while knocking out Poland.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: England vs. U.S. in a Group B match. From Al Bayt Stadium in Al Khor, Qatar. England opened with a 6-2 rout of Iran, while the USA drew 1-1 with Wales. This is the third World Cup meeting for these foes after a 1-0 U.S. win (1950) and a 1-1 draw (2010).

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Iran vs. U.S. in a Group B finale. From Al Thumama Stadium in Doha, Qatar. After two draws, Gregg Berhalter's Stars & Stripes are in must-win mode to advance to the round of 16. Hossein Hosseini and Matt Turner are both coming off three-save shutouts. Iran won a previous World Cup meeting in the 1998 group stage, 2-1.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Netherlands vs. Argentina in a quarterfinal match. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. Louis van Gaal's Dutch chase a fourth semifinal in their last five World Cups. They lost in the 2014 semis on penalties to Lionel Messi and Argentina, who drew 0-0 in a 2006 group-stage meeting and lost 2-1 to the Netherlands in the 1998 quarterfinals.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Argentina vs. France in the final. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. Golden Boot contenders Lionel Messi and Kylian Mbappe (five goals each in Qatar) star in the 11th clash of South America and Europe in a final. Didier Deschamps and "Les Bleus" can become the first back-to-back champs since Brazil 60 years ago, while the Argentines look to end a 36-year title drought since the days of Diego Maradona. Julian Alvarez and Olivier Giroud (four goals each) head the supporting casts.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Brazil vs. South Korea in a round-of-16 match. From Stadium 974 in Doha, Qatar. South Korea's Paulo Bento, the only remaining coach not from his team's country, tries to slay Tite's talented Samba Boys, who've won their last seven Round of 16 matches. Both teams are operating on just two days rest since their group finales.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Portugal vs. Switzerland in a round-of-16 match. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. The Swiss eye their first elimination-round win since 1938 as they try to slow a potent Portugal side manned by forwards Cristiano Ronaldo and Bruno Fernandes, now former teammates with Manchester United. These teams exchanged home shutout wins in Nations League play in June.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Argentina vs. Saudi Arabia in a Group C opener. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. Seven-time World Player of the Year Lionel Messi kicks off his fifth Cup (6 goals) for Argentina. The Saudis are the fifth national team managed by Hervé Renard, following Zambia (twice), Angola, Ivory Coast and Morocco.

programme.title: 2022 FIFA World Cup Qatar
programme.desc: Argentina vs. France in the final. From Lusail Iconic Stadium in Lusail, Qatar. programme.title: When the World Watched
programme.desc: A look behind-the-scenes and into the Argentina camp during the 1986 FIFA World Cup. Featuring first-hand the journey that took this group of players back to the top of the world and confirmed Diego Maradona as the best player on the planet.

programme.title: When the World Watched
programme.desc: Celebrating moments in the 2006 FIFA World Cup from Italy. This series, examines a tumultuous period for one of the giants of European football and tells the story of a total squad effort under a determined coach.

programme.title: The 700 Club
programme.desc: A religious-themed newsmagazine, one of TV's longest-running programs. On the air since 1966, it launched nationally in '72, before becoming the flagship of the Christian Broadcast Network in 1977. It mixes news---from a religious perspective---with inspirational interviews with celebrities, along with Bible readings and entertainment. Conservative icon (and 1988 presidential candidate) Pat Robertson founded the hugely popular program from a 1963 fund-raising pledge effort on UHF TV in Virginia.

programme.title: X
programme.desc: In the 1970s, an adult film crew goes to a remote Texas farm to shoot a film. The elderly couple they are renting from is unaware of what the crew intends for their property. But they do take an unusual interest in the young team. When the couple discovers the real intention of the youngsters, a night of profit-making passion turns to terror as they fight for their lives against their enraged hosts.

programme.desc: Alice and Tess discover some lies in their relationship; Shane has nowhere else to go to; Dani's romcom fantasy is ruined after she finds something that will test Sophie and Finley's trust; Micah and Maribel struggle with parenthood.

programme.title: Confess, Fletch
programme.desc: Confess, Fletch is a reboot of the classic crime-comedy film. This time, Fletch becomes the main suspect in a series of murders while investigating thieves that stole his girlfriend's art collection. To exonerate himself, Fletch begins his own investigation into the murders and discovers a lot of people could be the guilty party, including his art collecting girlfriend.

programme.title: Mr. Malcolm's List
programme.desc: Jeremy Malcolm is the most sought bachelor in the English countryside. Rumors surface of a list that lays out all the perfect qualities for Mr. Malcolm's future wife. A suitor from out of town hears about Mr. Malcolm and is convinced she can win him over. Based on the novel Mr. Malcolm's List by Suzanne Allain.

programme.title: Like a Boss
programme.desc: Two best friends with contrasting personalities decide to accept a big buyout offer from a cosmetics mogul to save their company from financial ruin. Drama and hilarity ensue as intellectual property theft places a major strain on their friendship and lifelong ambitions.

programme.title: Last Holiday
programme.desc: Romantic comedy about a shy American saleswoman whose doctor misdiagnoses her. When she believes that death is calling, she decides to go out with a bang and heads to Europe for an extended stay at a swanky resort.

programme.title: Something's Gotta Give
programme.desc: Jack Nicholson and Diane Keaton are dynamic in this witty romantic comedy. Nicholson plays an aging Lothario with a young girlfriend. He meets his soul mate, however, when he's introduced to his lover's mother, a playwright who can't stand the sight of him.

programme.title: Everything Everywhere All at Once
programme.desc: Grappling with the onset of middle age, a Chinese immigrant discovers that she can traverse across time and space. Teaming up with her alternate lives, the unlikely allies realize that they alone possess the power to protect the world from calamity, plunging them into the midst of an outlandish quest.

programme.title: Scream
programme.desc: After twenty-five peaceful years, Woodsboro once again faces Ghostface, the entity that previously shook the small and quiet town with its brutal crimes. The new perpetrator behind the mask goes after everyone related to the original murderers, opening old wounds once forcefully tucked away in the past. Sam Carpenter then enlists the help of the town's former Sheriff, Dewey Riley, and it doesn't take long until Sidney Prescott returns to face her old enemy.

programme.desc: Christmas brings no tidings of comfort and joy to Leonard, whose colleague starts dating Penny. Meanwhile, Sheldon drives everyone crazy over his adherence to gift-giving etiquette.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Leonard's mother (Christine Baranski) visits, which pleases Sheldon but upsets Leonard.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: A game of Dungeons & Dragons triggers Sheldon's memories of Christmases past, while Penny, Bernadette and Amy play matchmaker for Raj.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: On Christmas Eve, Amy plans a traditional Victorian dinner, while Raj, Leonard and Howard scramble to remove a pigeon that flew into the clean room at the university. To prove a point to Amy, a Scrooge-like Sheldon buys her the worst possible gift.

programme.title: The Big Bang Theory
programme.desc: Sheldon and Amy regale Leonard and Penny with details of their not-so-excellent adventure visiting his mother in Texas over the holidays.

programme.title: A Christmas Story
programme.desc: Holiday favorite set in 1940s Indiana about Ralphie, a 9-year-old boy who desperately yearns for a Red Rider BB gun for Christmas. Despite protests from his mother that he'll shoot his eye out, Ralphie persists, unsuccessfully trying to enlist the assistance of both his teacher and Santa Claus. All the while, Ralphie finds himself dealing with the constant taunts of a pair of bullies and trying to not get in the middle of a feud between his mother and father regarding a certain lamp.

programme.title: Christmas Around The World
programme.desc: From medieval to modern, unique Christmas experiences are found throughout the world. programme.title: Dr. Pimple Popper

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: An erratic whistleblower, who calls Pride her mentor, kidnaps him in an attempt to find a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans

Meanwhile, Tammy partners with former sleeper agent Eva Azarova to locate the missing operative Eva has known since childhood.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: The NCIS team investigates the copycat murder of an unsolved case from 150 years ago that spawned a legendary New Orleans ghost story. Meanwhile, Gregorio gets spooked when the case is connected to a recent séance and a local medium.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Sebastian is placed on administrative leave after his response in a foot chase to apprehend a high-value fugitive is questioned by the FBI. Meanwhile, Pride and the team continue to track the target and try to clear Sebastian's name.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Pride is spotted tracking one of Mayor Hamilton's accomplices, who then opens fire on a crowded street before disappearing.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: In the Season 3 finale, unable to trust anyone in New Orleans, the team calls in FBI Assistant Director Isler to help expose and stop the sinister scheme that Mayor Hamilton has planned for the residents of Clearwater.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: Season 4 begins with Pride still on probation six weeks after his rogue takedown of the corrupt Mayor Hamilton. Meanwhile, the team investigates an FBI case involving a stolen big rig of nuclear waste, unbeknownst to their new by-the-books supervisor.

programme.title: NCIS: New Orleans
programme.desc: An erratic whistleblower, who calls Pride her mentor, kidnaps him in an attempt to find a serial killer targeting young women in the Gulf of Mexico.

programme.title: The Change-Up
programme.desc: Family man Dave (Jason Bateman) and bachelor Mitch (Ryan Reynolds) swap bodies after a night on the town in this uproarious comedy. At first both men enjoy getting a reprieve from their regular routines, but soon they want their old lives back. Things get complicated when Dave's stunning legal associate Sabrina drops a bombshell, and Mitch gets a surprise visit from his estranged father.

programme.title: Identity Thief
programme.desc: A Denver businessman chases an Orlando thief who stole his identity and ruined his credit rating with a huge spending spree. When the local authorities refuse to arrest her, he heads to Orlando to personally capture her in this hysterical comedy.

programme.title: Game Night
programme.desc: When a fictional murder-mystery game turns into a real kidnapping, hypercompetitive couple Max and Annie must lead their wacky and wildly unqualified group of game-night friends to rescue Max's brother in this terrific action comedy.

programme.title: Tag
programme.desc: Five childhood friends have been competing in the same game of tag for 30 years. When one of them gets married, he attempts to retire from the intense annual game without ever being "it," causing the other four to band together to finally catch him.

programme.title: Bad Moms
programme.desc: Three overstressed, overworked mothers decide to blow off their responsibilities and have some fun in this hysterical comedy, but their wild ways cause them to clash with a rival mommy who's dedicated to preserving the facade of her perfect life.
